text: Mirabela Dauer, singer from Romania Mirabela Dauer (Bucharest, 9 July 1947) is a Romanian female pop star who was famous for muzică ușoară (easy listening) music of the 1980s.Denise Roman Denise Roman, Fragmented Identities: Popular Culture, Sex, and Everyday Life in Postcommunist Romania (New York: Lexington Books, 2003) 0739121189 - 2007 "In the late 1980s, the most famous Romanian vocalist-stars of muzică ușoară were Angela Similea, Corina Chiriac, and Mirabela Dauer, together with the rocker Dida Drăgan and the internationally acclaimed Aura Urziceanu..." ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Musicians from Bucharest‎
title: Mirabela Dauer
